trans-unit.source: Collects the characteristics associated with flow layouts.
trans-unit.target: Recolhe as características associadas com esquemas de fluxo.

trans-unit.source: The FlowLayoutSettings class collects and manages the characteristics associated with the flow layout scheme.
trans-unit.target: A classe de FlowLayoutSettings recolhe e gere as características associadas com o esquema de esquema de fluxo.

trans-unit.source: This class is used internally by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutPanel> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> classes, as well as the flow layout engine.
trans-unit.target: Esta classe é utilizada internamente pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutPanel>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>classes, bem como o motor de esquema de fluxo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutPanel>

trans-unit.source: The FlowLayoutSettings class is used by the layout engine to determine how to layout the container's child controls.
trans-unit.target: A classe de FlowLayoutSettings é utilizada pelo motor de esquema para determinar a forma como a esquema subordinados do contentor controla.

trans-unit.source: The FlowLayoutSettings class manages the following information: - The flow direction of consecutive controls.
trans-unit.target: A classe de FlowLayoutSettings gere as seguintes informações:-a direcção do fluxo de controlos consecutivos.

trans-unit.source: - Whether the contents should be wrapped or clipped if the child controls cannot be contained within their parent.
trans-unit.target: -Se o conteúdo deve ser moldado ou anexado se os controlos subordinados não podem ser contidos dentro do respetivo elemento principal.

trans-unit.source: FlowLayoutSettings does not have a public constructor.
trans-unit.target: FlowLayoutSettings não tem um construtor público.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating the flow direction of consecutive controls.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica a direcção do fluxo de controlos consecutivos.

trans-unit.source: FlowDirection is the default property for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutSettings> class.
trans-unit.target: FlowDirection é a propriedade predefinida para a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutSettings>classe.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutSettings>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FlowDirection"></xref> indicating the flow direction of consecutive controls in the container.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FlowDirection"> </xref> que indica a direcção do fluxo de consecutivos controlos no contentor.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FlowDirection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FlowDirection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that represents the flow break setting of the control.
trans-unit.target: Devolve um valor que representa o fluxo de interromper a definição do controlo.

trans-unit.source: The child control.
trans-unit.target: O controlo subordinado.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the flow break is set; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se estiver definida a quebra de fluxo; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the current flow layout engine.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o motor de esquema de fluxo actual.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutSettings.LayoutEngine%2A> property is typically used in two contexts: - A container that uses a flow layout.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutSettings.LayoutEngine%2A>propriedade é normalmente utilizada em dois contextos:-um contentor que utiliza um esquema de fluxo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutSettings.LayoutEngine%2A>

trans-unit.source: - A control contained within a flow layout container (for example, a button contained in a cell of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutPanel>).
trans-unit.target: -Um controlo contido dentro de um contentor de esquema de fluxo (por exemplo, um botão incluído numa célula de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutPanel>).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutPanel>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine"></xref> currently being used.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine"> </xref> atualmente a ser utilizado.

trans-unit.source: Sets the value that represents the flow break setting of the control.
trans-unit.target: Define o valor que representa o fluxo de interromper a definição do controlo.

trans-unit.source: The child control.
trans-unit.target: O controlo subordinado.

trans-unit.source: The flow break value to set.
trans-unit.target: O valor de quebra de fluxo a definir.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the contents should be wrapped or clipped when they exceed the original boundaries of their container.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o conteúdo deve ser moldado ou anexado quando que excedem os limites de originais do respetivo contentor.

trans-unit.source: If the area of the container is too small to display all the child controls, then at least one control will be clipped regardless of the WrapContents value.
trans-unit.target: Se a área do contentor é demasiado pequena para apresentar os controlos subordinados, pelo menos um controlo será anexado independentemente do valor de WrapContents.

trans-unit.source: Subsequent resizing of the container will reapply the layout to the contained controls.
trans-unit.target: Redimensionamento subsequentes do contentor irá voltar a aplicar o esquema para os controlos nele contidos.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the contents should be wrapped; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the contents should be clipped.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o conteúdo tem de estar entre; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> se o conteúdo deve ser anexado.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.
